message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $95 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it might hold. However, I am only willing to pay $85 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $90. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value, and $90 is a fair price.

I see that you're standing firm at $90, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose $87 as my maximum offer. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
